home:header:label: MYSPORTS REWARDS
home:header:title: YOUR MOTIVATION APP FOR MORE MOVEMENT
home:header:p: Whether you're walking, cycling or doing any other sporting activity, MySports Rewards encourages you to be more active and healthy - with a reward system that's fun to use. It's never been easier to get moving. Join now, whether alone, with friends, in a team or through your employer.
home:content:title: ACTIVITY THAT PAYS OFF FOR ALL
home:footer:title: GET ACTIVE NOW AND DOWNLOAD THE APP
home:footer:p: Would you also like to move more and do something for your fitness and well-being? Take advantage of the MySports Rewards app now!
